name: LudumDare45_Entry
description:
You start with only your fists to guide you. Can you harvest parts to make your way through this gauntlet of bosses? I mean he totally wont get weapons as we didn't get that far, and yes...  there are only 2 bosses....  but still, have fun.

Controls Keyboard: 
Move: WASD or Arrow Keys 
Attack: "Space Bar"

Controls GamePad (Xbox Only):
Move: Left stick
Attack: X or A buttons

Team:
Jordan - Role: Master and Commander, Snack Beast
Martin - Role: Scope Creep
Alex   - Role: Tummy Grumbler
Josh   - Role: Scope Creep Jr. , Moral Support
